subject: RE: [junit] JUnit 4.8.1 in maven repository?
msgSnippet: Took me a while to find the vote button... but for those that can t find it... it is the grey up arrow under the issue number. Just wanted to save someone some
messageBody:
Took me a while to find the vote button... but for those that can't find it... it is the grey up arrow under the issue number.

Just wanted to save someone some time.

Big Mike

From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of David Saff
Sent: Monday, December 14, 2009 8:50 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [junit] JUnit 4.8.1 in maven repository?



We have not traditionally maintained the maven details ourselves, but
it appears that our mysterious benefactor isn't fast enough for some
users. Feel free to vote at

http://github.com/KentBeck/junit/issues#issue/66

if quick maven uploads are an important feature of JUnit's usefulness to you.

David Saff

On Sat, Dec 12, 2009 at 4:14 AM, Bill Shannon <Bill.Shannon@...<mailto:Bill.Shannon%40sun.com>> wrote:
> I see that JUnit 4.8.1 has been released. The newest version in the
> maven repository (http://repo2.maven.org/maven2/junit/junit/) is 4.7.
> Can someone add the newer versions to the maven repository?
>
> Thanks.
>
>
> ------------------------------------
>
> Yahoo! Groups Links
>
>
>
>
